categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: The wife of Jorem Yange was a female Sith of the Sith Empire who was one of Darth Baras's infiltrators. She was captured by the Jedi Master Somminick Timmns in 3653 BBY, and Yange was ordered by Baras to kill her when she started spilling information.
